** Shares of Ford Motor Co F.N up 0.5% at $24.5, Rivian Automotive RIVN.O up 1% at $73.89 - before the bell

** Ford said its Q4 results would include an $8.2 bln gain on investment in EV maker RIVN (Full Story)

** Ford currently owns about 12% of RIVN; Amazon.com AMZN.O is also among its top investors and is also a customer for its electric delivery van model

** Michigan-headquartered automaker is set to report results on Feb. 3

** RIVN fell as much as 8.9% to its lowest since IPO and closed below its IPO price at $73.16 amid a broader tech selloff

** As of last close, Ford's market cap was $95.7 bln, $4.3 bln under the $100 bln milestone it hit last week

** Up to last close, Ford had risen ~57% since it last reported results on Oct. 27 and RIVN had fallen ~6% from IPO price of $78


(Reporting by Akash Sriram in Bengaluru)
